ygData.subject: Re: Petition and general opinions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... *grin* This ain t the Cleric list, so I wasn t bitching about that *chuckles* I will concede that there are numerous Bards out there who can fight far
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:50 PM 6/9/99 -0400, you wrote:
>True, but we're better at combat in every way compared to a cleric, and they
>can
>wear plate... so why would we not be able to?

*grin* This ain't the Cleric list, so I wasn't bitching about that *chuckles*
I will concede that there are numerous Bards out there who can fight far
better than I. And I'm jealous. But I certainly don't wish them any ill.
The real fact of the matter is, having access to plate gives us more
options. It does not railroad us into wearing it. We can if we want, or
we can choose other paths.

Talies the Wanderer
